info.name: AquaMind API
info.description: API collection for AquaMind project - Complete with FIFO Feed Inventory System and Scenario Planning & Simulation

item.name: Inventory

request.description: Get all feed types

body.raw:
{
	"name": "Premium Salmon Feed",
	"brand": "AquaFeed Pro",
	"description": "High-quality feed for salmon growth phase",
	"protein_percentage": 45.0,
	"fat_percentage": 22.0,
	"carbohydrate_percentage": 20.0,
	"ash_percentage": 8.0,
	"moisture_percentage": 5.0,
	"pellet_size_mm": 6.0,
	"is_active": true
}

request.description: Create a new feed type

item.name: Feed Purchases

request.description: Get all feed purchases for FIFO tracking

body.raw:
{
	"feed": 1,
	"supplier": "AquaFeed Suppliers Ltd",
	"batch_number": "AF-2025-001",
	"quantity_kg": 1000.0,
	"cost_per_kg": 2.50,
	"purchase_date": "2025-06-01",
	"expiry_date": "2026-06-01",
	"notes": "Premium feed batch for Q2 2025"
}

request.description: Create a new feed purchase batch for FIFO tracking
Get details of a specific feed purchase

item.description: Feed purchase management for FIFO tracking

request.description: Get all feed container stock entries for FIFO tracking
Add feed from a purchase batch to a container using FIFO service

item.name: Get Container Stock in FIFO Order

query.description: ID of the container to get FIFO order for

request.description: Get feed container stock in FIFO order (oldest first)
Create a new feed container stock entry
Update a feed container stock entry

item.name: Feeding Events

request.description: Get all feeding events with calculated feed costs

item.name: Create Feeding Event (with FIFO Cost Calculation)

body.raw:
{
	"batch": 1,
	"container": 1,
	"feed": 1,
	"feeding_date": "2025-06-10",
	"feeding_time": "08:00:00",
	"amount_kg": 25.5,
	"batch_biomass_kg": 1200.0,
	"method": "MANUAL",
	"notes": "Morning feeding - FIFO cost will be auto-calculated",
	"recorded_by": 1
}

request.description: Create a new feeding event - feed_cost will be calculated using FIFO methodology

item.name: Get Feeding Event with Cost Details

request.description: Get details of a specific feeding event including calculated feed cost

item.description: Feeding events with FIFO cost calculation

item.description: Batch feeding summaries with FCR calculations

request.description: Get all feed stocks (legacy - use FIFO container stock for new implementations)

item.description: Legacy feed stock management (use FIFO container stock for new implementations)
Inventory management with FIFO feed tracking and FCR calculations

item.name: Scenario Planning
Temperature Profiles

request.description: Get all temperature profiles with statistics and date ranges

formdata.description: CSV file with columns: date, temperature

request.description: Upload temperature data from CSV file. Format: date,temperature
Create temperature profile using date ranges with constant or interpolated values
Get specific temperature profile with all readings
Get detailed statistics including monthly averages for a temperature profile
Delete a temperature profile

item.description: Temperature profile management for TGC calculations
